title: Holiday Pay Configuration
description: Schema for provincial holiday pay calculation rules

effective_date.description: Date when this configuration becomes effective

end_date.description: Last date this configuration is valid

changes.description: List of changes from previous edition

premium_rate.description: Premium multiplier for working on holidays (e.g., 1.5)

premium_rate_tiers.description: Optional tiered premium rates for extended hours (e.g., BC 2x after 12 hours)

hours_threshold.description: Hours threshold after which this rate applies

rate.description: Premium rate for hours above threshold

last_verified_date.description: Date when rules were last verified against government sources

lookback_weeks.description: Number of weeks to look back for wage calculation

lookback_days.description: Number of days to look back for wage calculation

include_vacation_pay.description: Whether to include vacation pay in calculation

include_overtime.description: Whether to include overtime pay in calculation

include_previous_holiday_pay.description: Whether to include previous holiday pay in calculation

include_sick_pay.description: Whether to include sick pay in calculation (BC ESA s.45)

default_daily_hours.description: Default daily hours for simple formulas

new_employee_fallback.description: Fallback behavior for new employees with no historical data

construction_percentage.description: Special percentage for construction industry (e.g., 0.04 for 4% in MB)

alberta_5_of_9_weeks.description: Number of weeks for Alberta 5 of 9 rule (default: 9)

commission_lookback_weeks.description: Quebec commission employee lookback period in weeks (e.g., 12)

irregular_hours_lookback_weeks.description: Yukon irregular hours lookback period in weeks (e.g., 2)

lookback_period_days.description: Configurable lookback period in days (overrides lookback_days)

eligibility_lookback_days.description: Days to look back for eligibility checks (default: 30)

last_first_window_days.description: Days to search forward for first scheduled day after holiday (default: 14)

require_last_first_rule.description: Whether employee must work last shift before and first shift after holiday

min_days_worked_in_period.description: Minimum days worked in period (e.g., PE requires 15 days in 30-day period)

count_work_days.description: If true, count actual work days instead of calendar days for eligibility (Alberta-style)

eligibility_period_months.description: Period to look back for work days (default: 12 months)
